tag_list: sensage, karmawell, inhale-digital, cfo, consulting, food-com, optive, omidyar-network, personic, catapult-communications
overview:
Joan Varrone provides part time CFO consulting services to venture backed start-ups through her firm CFO Consulting and Services. Joan has over 15 years experience as a CFO where she has raised over $100M of venture capital, $10M of venture debt and lead a successful IPO. Joan has also held Senior Finance positions at large public multinational corporations.

Joan’s experience spans many industries including mobile apps and gaming, e commerce, SaaS and enterprise software, telecommuniations, nano technology and semi-conductor.

Joan has held CFO positions at the following companies

  • Inhale Digital (consulting CFO)
  • Karma Well(consulting CFO)
  • Lyris (interim CFO)
  • SenSage
  • Optiva
  • Omidyar Network
  • Personic
  • Food.com
  • Catapult Communciations
